title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Code Llama, and other LLMs as a single Go binary with a REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; sync & async APIs for chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper with REPL, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama (chat, generate, embeddings, model ops).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API (chat, generate, pull, list).

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider + Facade wrapping ollama/ollama-php for artisan commands and queues.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async chat, streaming, and model management.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN service tasks.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats using local Ollama models with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for private or channel-based LLM queries.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package distributing the ollama-js client library.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for the ollama-python client.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama ecosystem discussions, model sharing, and troubleshooting.
